title: Drawing, "Aquarius, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center: aquario inverno 2; slightly below in graphite: aquario 9; in graphite: squared off at sides 1-4 and at top and bottom 1-8 with light source symbol at upper left.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Winged putto pouring water from jug
